PipeSystem.ProcessDef.label: Infuse oil and herbal medicine into infused oil
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.description: Turns 10 oil and 10 herbal medicine into 10 infused oil.
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.labelOverride: Infuse 10 oil and 10 herbal medicine into 10 infused oil

PipeSystem.ProcessDef.label: Infuse oil and fungus into truffle oil
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.description: Turns 15 oil and 50 raw fungus into 6 truffle oil.
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.labelOverride: Infuse 15 oil and 50 raw fungus into 6 truffle oil

PipeSystem.ProcessDef.label: Infuse vinegar and berries into balsamic vinegar
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.description: Turns 15 vinegar and 50 berries into 12 balsamic vinegar.
PipeSystem.ProcessDef.labelOverride: Infuse 15 vinegar and 50 berries into 12 balsamic vinegar
